name: Whack-a-Crab
description:
Whack crabs and reach your dreams of reaching that high score. Hit 3 times without missing and the score multiplies. Hit 10 times without missing and a wave will appear. WHACK THE WAVE TO REMOVE ALL THE SPIKES. Hit the spikes and it's game over.   

Controls:

Left-mouse to whack.

p.s  Golden Crabs can appear once in a blue moon.
